name: Lilaina: Space Bounty Hunter
description:
The Story

Lilaina is a bounty hunter who lives in the northern part of the Milky Way galaxy. She receives mission requests to eliminate invading alien spaceships and gets rewarded with money for doing the job.

Lilaina wears skimpy outfits during her missions because aliens can easily detect fabric and clothes, but it is hard for aliens to detect the human skin unless the human gets very close to them!

The Gameplay

A single player action third-person shooter game with some puzzles and platforming.

Features:
-Third-person shooter
-Explore beautifully designed sci-fi environments
-Use a variety of weapons
-Fight a variety of alien species.
-Thrilling sexy cutscenes
-A single player action game with some puzzles and platforming
-Use close-quarters combat to knock down your enemies
-Sexy 3D female characters
